title: Night raid nets three suspects and firearms in Kranskop
text:
A NIGHT operation in Kranskop and surrounding areas by Umzinyathi Cluster Task Team and Crime Intelligence netted three suspects last Thursday.

Four unlicensed firearms, including an AK47 rifle, and ammunition were recovered.

Provincial spokesperson Lieutenant-Colonel Thulani Zwane said the task team was conducting a raid when the suspects were caught. The suspects appeared in the Kranskop Magistrate’s Court the following day on charges of possession of unlicensed firearm and ammunition.

The case was adjourned.
